--- title: "Probability Theory" --- ::: callout-note Assignment I on Probability Theory ::: # Assignment 1 - Solution ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_1c1949ec60bf4ebfa92665ca916d4eb9'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Given probabilities prob_change_in_scope <- 0.3 prob_on_time_given_change <- 0.2 prob_on_time_given_no_change <- 0.6 # Calculate probabilities prob_on_time_and_change <- prob_change_in_scope * prob_on_time_given_change prob_on_time_and_no_change <- (1 - prob_change_in_scope) * prob_on_time_given_no_change prob_not_on_time_and_change <- prob_change_in_scope * (1 - prob_on_time_given_change) prob_not_on_time_and_no_change <- (1 - prob_change_in_scope) * (1 - prob_on_time_given_no_change) sum_all_prob <- prob_on_time_and_change + prob_on_time_and_no_change + prob_not_on_time_and_change + prob_not_on_time_and_no_change ``` ::: Probability of ![Caption](../../assets/img/ass1_a.png) = ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_8d05d2b4e65897fb7adaa012124231b2'} ```{.r .cell-code} cat(prob_on_time_and_change) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> 0.06 ``` ::: ::: Probability of ![Caption](../../assets/img/ass1_b.png) = ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_e980cb9b0e4fedac9402fbca7087d957'} ```{.r .cell-code} cat(prob_on_time_and_no_change) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> 0.42 ``` ::: ::: Probability of ![Caption](../../assets/img/ass1_c.png) = ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_21bce0a29ae8006a75edacdb46a7d70a'} ```{.r .cell-code} cat(prob_not_on_time_and_change) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> 0.24 ``` ::: ::: Probability of ![Caption](../../assets/img/ass1_d.png) = ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_322e8dcb31a5037d583fdf0385797385'} ```{.r .cell-code} cat(prob_not_on_time_and_no_change) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> 0.28 ``` ::: ::: Sum of all probabilities = ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_97dbbca589cf9e7407e67bbab6e0505f'} ```{.r .cell-code} cat(sum_all_prob) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> 1 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_56e68e87e1d55471db0a1475f020133e'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Define the probabilities of the events p_S = 0.3 # probability of having a change in scope p_S_prime = 0.7 # probability of having no change in scope p_T_given_S = 0.2 # probability of being on time given a change in scope p_T_prime_given_S = 0.8 # probability of not being on time given a change in scope p_T_given_S_prime = 0.6 # probability of being on time given no change in scope p_T_prime_given_S_prime = 0.4 # probability of not being on time given no change in scope # Compute the intersection probabilities p_T_and_S = p_S * p_T_given_S p_T_and_S_prime = p_S_prime * p_T_given_S_prime p_T_prime_and_S = p_S * p_T_prime_given_S p_T_prime_and_S_prime = p_S_prime * p_T_prime_given_S_prime # Print the results cat("P(T ∩ S) = ", p_T_and_S, "\n") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> P(T ∩ S) = 0.06 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} cat("P(T ∩ S') = ", p_T_and_S_prime, "\n") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> P(T ∩ S') = 0.42 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} cat("P(T' ∩ S) = ", p_T_prime_and_S, "\n") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> P(T' ∩ S) = 0.24 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} cat("P(T' ∩ S') = ", p_T_prime_and_S_prime, "\n") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> P(T' ∩ S') = 0.28 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} # Compute the sum of all four probabilities sum_prob = p_T_and_S + p_T_and_S_prime + p_T_prime_and_S + p_T_prime_and_S_prime cat("The sum of all four probabilities = ", sum_prob, "\n") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> The sum of all four probabilities = 1 ``` ::: ::: # Assignment 2 - Solution This is a `.qmd` file. It is plain text with special features. Any time you write just like this, it will be compiled to normal text in the website. If you put a \# in front of your text, it will create a top level-header. ````` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-10_945c8ddc0cb5bdaf7a077d1671e36a29'} ```{.r .cell-code} plot(cars) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](01_probability_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672} ::: :::
